artist: Photographer: Mark Boyle; Author: J. L. Locher; Publisher: Edition Hansjörg Mayer, Stuttgart and London
creditline: Gift of William H. Hahn via the Martin Ackerman Foundation
description: Monograph. Black cloth boards, b/w illustrated dust jacket; illustrated frontispiece; illustrated throughout in b/w and several color; 270 pp.
medium: Black-and-white and color illustrations; gelatin silver print (unbound), and letterpress; bound volume
title: Mark Boyle's Journey to the Surface of the Earth
